member.name: TCP_ESTATS_OBS_REC_ROD_v0
member.summary: The TCP_ESTATS_OBS_REC_ROD_v0 structure contains read-only dynamic information for extended TCP statistics observed on the remote receiver for a TCP connection.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_OBS_REC_ROD_v0.CurRwinRcvd
member.summary: The most recent window advertisement, in bytes, received from the remote receiver.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_OBS_REC_ROD_v0.MaxRwinRcvd
member.summary: The maximum window advertisement, in bytes, received from the remote receiver.

member.name: TCP_ESTATS_OBS_REC_ROD_v0.MinRwinRcvd
member.summary: The minimum window advertisement, in bytes, received from the remote receiver.

summary.para: The value of the received window scale option if one was received from the remote receiver; otherwise, a value of -1.

Note that if both the WinScaleSent member of the structure and the WinScaleRcvd member are not -1, then Snd.Wind.Scale will be the same as this value and used to scale receiver window announcements from the remote host to the local host.
